Author: Caraxi
Name: Simple Tweaks
Description:
Collection of simple ideas that are too small to warrent their own plugin.
Tweaks: [All are optional are disabled by default]
 - Lock chat size and position.
 - Show exact percentage for item durability and spiritbond.
 - Show current desynthesis level on desynthable items.
 - Disable title screen movie.
 - Copy item name with a hotkey.
 - Show average item level when examining other players.
 - Command to open character directory.
 - Command to change tooltip settings.
 - Command to change movement type.
 - Highlight active food stats (Current / Max).
 - Show player item levels when examining them.
 - Remove the 'Casting' text from cast bar.
 - Adjust the positioning of the ability name on target cast bars.
 - Create aliases for commands. (e.g. '/g' -> '/fc')
